purpose: To provide a platform for developing, managing, and deploying AI agents in a scalable and modular way
principle: Built on a modular architecture using Go, allowing for the creation and orchestration of multiple AI agents
reusability: Designed for extensibility with modular components and APIs, supporting integration with various AI models
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and community support
name: obot
highlight: Framework for building and orchestrating AI agents with a focus on modularity and scalability
